ChannelHint: Loading each channel SDK for different channels. Passing the channel Key for background statistics when game initialization.
p1h1: Developers can use SG login, payment function. Convenient, fast and safe.
p1h21: You have to apply SG developer before using SG SDK. You can go
p1h22: for registration. Fill in your company's name and the contact person to apply.
p1h3: Wait for administrators to send a confirm Email after registration. Click the link to launch your developer account after receiving Email.
p1h41: After SG developer being launched, you can go
p1h42: to add a new game you'll launch.
p1h5: Wait for administrators to open your game. You can get GameKey, AppSecret and PrivateKey after receiving the Open Email. Then you can use SG SDK.
p6h2: Integration was successfully when Cause displays 1. By looking parameter you can check problems about SDK integration.
